title: Colmar Agglomération
text:
Colmar Agglomération is the "<a href="communaut%C3%A9%20d%27agglom%C3%A9ration">communauté d'agglomération</a>", an <a href="Communes%20of%20France%23Intercommunality">intercommunal</a> structure, centred on the <a href="Communes%20of%20France">city</a> of <a href="Colmar">Colmar</a>. It is located in the <a href="Haut-Rhin">Haut-Rhin</a> <a href="departments%20of%20France">department</a>, in the <a href="Grand%20Est">Grand Est</a> <a href="regions%20of%20France">region</a>, northeastern <a href="France">France</a>. It was created in November 2003. Its seat is in Colmar. Its population was 113,654 in 2017, of which 69,105 in Colmar proper.
Composition.
The communauté d'agglomération consists of the following 20 communes:
